title: Custom skins allowed?
body: Im thinking about getting the custom skin for leblanc.  Im pretty sure its called crystal maiden lb.  But before I do anything I wanna know if its not allowed (aka will I get banned if i use it).  Also I wanna know if that particular skin is safe to download and install (aka - does it have any virus's).  So can someone answer those questions for me plz; specifically from riot themselves so I know if they will ban my account or not.

replies.body:
It's really tough for us to greenlight what specific custom skins or programs are okay or not, since we don't develop them. The TL:DR is that, in general, we take action against players who use programs that can be used to gain a competitive advantage. Because you don't write the program yourself, the developer could slip some new feature in there that wasn't initially in there, and cause it to violate our [terms of use. ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse)

As with any program that edits or modifies the League folder, if you choose to make those changes or use a program that does, you do so at your own risk.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Im pretty sure that this is just a visual custom skin, and obviously no one else can see it but me.  I'll do some research of the skin and let you know.

I'm unable to assist you in modifying your files, as it is against the Terms of Use and we don't officially support it. As *Xenos Von Faneli* mentioned, since we don't make these custom skins or programs that provide them, we cannot keep tabs on what they do and the changes that are constantly made to them. Again, if you move forward with making those modifications, it is **at your own risk**.
Wow, your really good at making me not wanna do it.  Thanks, I would rather keep an account then a skin.

As Targons Blade said basically use at your own risk, nothings stopping you from doing it, but it could get you in trouble if it does more than just change looks, as to whether it's safe Riot doesn't have the answers because it's not theirs so they don't keep tabs on it

I personally wouldn't do it, because it would change files of your client.
And I'm 100% sure, that changing files of the client is against the Terms of Use and therefore a punishable offense.
I.e. a friend of mine edited the locale file of his client to play in Korean and he got perma banned.

Some of my friends say that having a custom skin is allowed since they don't give you any advantages over other player.
But yea, I wouldn't do it.

Plus if that skin is safe to download and install is in the end your decision.
